external_games.name: Era of Samurai: Code of Love

name: Era of Samurai: Code of Love
storyline:
It's the end of the Edo period.
After being attacked, you ended up being saved by the famous Shisengumi warriors. Even if their hands have the strength to hold a sword, they can't have the kindness to hold you...
A love fulled of desperation that'll put your life in the line, this love story with the Shisengumi opens its curtain.
